item.title: R-F - Help with my new interface
item.dc:creator: @gunnz94 gunnz94
item.description:
@gunnz94 wrote:

Hey everybody!![size=24pt]
Please no flaming because of the font or anything related to the images, also this is a delta source - and non-renamed client, please no flame necessary[/size]
Thanks for taking the time to look at my help thread, if you know how to fix this issue I am having, I would be greatly appreciative and will “thank” you if it works.

This is how it’s supposed to look:


(used Interface Maker)

but it comes out:

The method i made for it was called aFirst… so here is the scripts for it –

public static void aFirst(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intaFirst = AddTab(4325); intaFirst.anIntArray240 = new int[3]; intaFirst.anIntArray241 = new int[3]; intaFirst.anIntArray272 = new int[3]; //Main interface intaFirst.anIntArray240[0] = 4326; intaFirst.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intaFirst.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //No main interface image. //Control 1 of main interface (Panel) intaFirst.anIntArray240[1] = 4327; intaFirst.anIntArray241[1] = 4; intaFirst.anIntArray272[1] = 16; //Panel pnl0 Class9 pnl0 = AddTab(4327); pnl0.anIntArray240 = new int[25]; pnl0.anIntArray241 = new int[25]; pnl0.anIntArray272 = new int[25]; pnl0.anInt261 = 0; pnl0.anInt220 = 502; pnl0.anInt267 = 303; AddInterfaceImage(4327, "aFirst", "Unt11tled.png"); //Control 0 of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[0] = 4327; pnl0.anIntArray241[0] = 59; pnl0.anIntArray272[0] = 268; //Control 1B of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[1] = 4329; pnl0.anIntArray241[1] = 80; pnl0.anIntArray272[1] = 279; AddInterfaceLabel(4329, "FURYAN", wid, 2, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(4328, 90, 41, "TextButton", "aFirst", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 2 of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[2] = 4329; pnl0.anIntArray241[2] = 59; pnl0.anIntArray272[2] = 224; //Control 3B of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[3] = 4331; pnl0.anIntArray241[3] = 80; pnl0.anIntArray272[3] = 235; AddInterfaceLabel(4331, "NECRO", wid, 2, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(4330, 90, 41, "TextButton", "aFirst", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 4 of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[4] = 4331; pnl0.anIntArray241[4] = 59; pnl0.anIntArray272[4] = 136; //Control 5B of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[5] = 4333; pnl0.anIntArray241[5] = 80; pnl0.anIntArray272[5] = 147; AddInterfaceLabel(4333, "WARRIOR", wid, 2, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(4332, 90, 41, "TextButton", "aFirst", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 6 of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[6] = 4333; pnl0.anIntArray241[6] = 59; pnl0.anIntArray272[6] = 47; //Control 7B of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[7] = 4335; pnl0.anIntArray241[7] = 80; pnl0.anIntArray272[7] = 58; AddInterfaceLabel(4335, "KNIGHT", wid, 2, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(4334, 90, 41, "TextButton", "aFirst", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 8 of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[8] = 4335; pnl0.anIntArray241[8] = 59; pnl0.anIntArray272[8] = 180; //Control 9B of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[9] = 4337; pnl0.anIntArray241[9] = 80; pnl0.anIntArray272[9] = 191; AddInterfaceLabel(4337, "ELF", wid, 2, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(4336, 90, 41, "TextButton", "aFirst", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 10 of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[10] = 4337; pnl0.anIntArray241[10] = 59; pnl0.anIntArray272[10] = 92; //Control 11B of panel pnl0 (TextButton) pnl0.anIntArray240[11] = 4339; pnl0.anIntArray241[11] = 80; pnl0.anIntArray272[11] = 103; AddInterfaceLabel(4339, "THIEF", wid, 2, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(4338, 90, 41, "TextButton", "aFirst", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 12 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[12] = 4339; pnl0.anIntArray241[12] = 21; pnl0.anIntArray272[12] = 183; AddInterfaceImage(4340, "aFirst", "32922.png"); //Control 13 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[13] = 4340; pnl0.anIntArray241[13] = 22; pnl0.anIntArray272[13] = 271; AddInterfaceImage(4341, "aFirst", "3279.png"); //Control 14 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[14] = 4341; pnl0.anIntArray241[14] = 21; pnl0.anIntArray272[14] = 47; AddInterfaceImage(4342, "aFirst", "3281.png"); //Control 15 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[15] = 4342; pnl0.anIntArray241[15] = 20; pnl0.anIntArray272[15] = 95; AddInterfaceImage(4343, "aFirst", "3290.png"); //Control 16 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[16] = 4343; pnl0.anIntArray241[16] = 21; pnl0.anIntArray272[16] = 138; AddInterfaceImage(4344, "aFirst", "3289.png"); //Control 17 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[17] = 4344; pnl0.anIntArray241[17] = 21; pnl0.anIntArray272[17] = 227; AddInterfaceImage(4345, "aFirst", "3283.png"); //Control 18 of panel pnl0 (Label) pnl0.anIntArray240[18] = 4345; pnl0.anIntArray241[18] = 150; pnl0.anIntArray272[18] = 56; AddInterfaceLabel(4346, "DEFENCE & HITPOINTS EFFECIENCY", wid, 2, 0xF5F5F5); //Control 19 of panel pnl0 (Label) pnl0.anIntArray240[19] = 4346; pnl0.anIntArray241[19] = 150; pnl0.anIntArray272[19] = 102; AddInterfaceLabel(4347, "THIEVING & AGILITY EFFECIENCY", wid, 2, 0xF5F5F5); //Control 20 of panel pnl0 (Label) pnl0.anIntArray240[20] = 4347; pnl0.anIntArray241[20] = 150; pnl0.anIntArray272[20] = 144; AddInterfaceLabel(4348, "ATTACK & SMITHING EFFECIENCY", wid, 2, 0xF5F5F5); //Control 21 of panel pnl0 (Label) pnl0.anIntArray240[21] = 4348; pnl0.anIntArray241[21] = 150; pnl0.anIntArray272[21] = 188; AddInterfaceLabel(4349, "ARCHER & FLETCHING EFFECIENCY", wid, 2, 0xF5F5F5); //Control 22 of panel pnl0 (Label) pnl0.anIntArray240[22] = 4349; pnl0.anIntArray241[22] = 150; pnl0.anIntArray272[22] = 233; AddInterfaceLabel(4350, "MAGIC & RUNECRAFTING EFFECIENCY", wid, 2, 0xF5F5F5); //Control 23 of panel pnl0 (Label) pnl0.anIntArray240[23] = 4350; pnl0.anIntArray241[23] = 150; pnl0.anIntArray272[23] = 278; AddInterfaceLabel(4351, "STRENGTH & PRAYER EFFECIENCY", wid, 2, 0xF5F5F5); //Control 24 of panel pnl0 (Image) pnl0.anIntArray240[24] = 4351; pnl0.anIntArray241[24] = 374; pnl0.anIntArray272[24] = 67; AddInterfaceImage(4352, "aFirst", "info.png"); //Control 2 of main interface (Label) intaFirst.anIntArray240[2] = 4328; intaFirst.anIntArray241[2] = 159; intaFirst.anIntArray272[2] = 16; AddInterfaceLabel(4328, "CHOOSE YOUR CLASS", wid, 3, 0xFFA500); }

and yes, all the image file names are correct

Thanks for viewing whether or not you help me!

Gunnz94
